Appointments Sports Medicine Foot and Ankle Hand Fracture Care

Upper and Lower Extremity Fracture Management at SM Orthopedics

At San Marcos Orthopedics, we specialize in comprehensive fracture management for both upper and lower extremity injuries. Our dedicated team of orthopedic and podiatric specialists are committed to providing personalized and effective care, offering a range of treatment options, including nonoperative and surgical interventions. Dr. Crum and Robinson routinely manage complex extremity trauma while taking orthopedic trauma call throughout the hospital systems of New Braunfels, San Marcos, and Kyle, Texas.

Extensive Fracture Mangement Expertise

Nonoperative Treatment Options: For fractures that require surgical intervention, our orthopedic surgeons utilize advanced techniques to achieve precise and stable fixation. From traditional open reduction internal fixation (ORIF) to minimally invasive procedures, we tailor our surgical approach to the unique characteristics of each fracture, prioritizing efficient healing and functional recovery.

Surgical Treatment Options: For fractures that require surgical intervention, our orthopedic surgeons utilize advanced techniques to achieve precise and stable fixation. From traditional open reduction internal fixation (ORIF) to minimally invasive procedures, we tailor our surgical approach to the unique characteristics of each fracture, prioritizing efficient healing and functional recovery.

Routine Management of Complex Extremity Injuries

Expertise in Complex Cases: Our orthopedic specialists have extensive experience in managing complex extremity injuries, including fractures that involve multiple bones, joints, or soft tissues. We leverage our expertise to develop customized treatment plans that address the specific challenges posed by each unique case.

Expertise in Hand Fractures: At San Marcos Orthopedics, Dr. Mundanthanam specializes in complex hand specific trauma and Workers Comp injuries.

Expertise in fractures of the Foot and Ankle: Dr. McDonnell and Dr. Saini specialize in complex injuries to the foot and ankle.

Orthopedic Trauma Call: We are proud to serve the communities of New Braunfels, San Marcos, and Kyle, Texas, by taking orthopedic trauma call. This commitment allows us to be readily available for emergency situations, providing timely and expert care for fractures and other orthopedic injuries.

Why Choose San Marcos Orthopedics for Fracture Management?

  • Comprehensive Care: Our approach to fracture management encompasses the full spectrum of treatment options, ensuring a personalized plan tailored to each patient's needs.
  • Advanced Surgical Techniques: When surgery is necessary, we employ state-of-the-art surgical techniques to optimize outcomes and facilitate a swift return to normal activities.
  • Community Engagement: By routinely engaging in orthopedic call, we actively participate in the well-being of our local communities, offering immediate care for orthopedic emergencies.

Schedule a Consultation

If you or a loved one has experienced an upper or lower extremity fracture, trust San Marcos Orthopedics for expert and compassionate care. Contact us today to schedule a consultation and explore the range of treatment options available for fracture management. Our goal is to restore function, alleviate pain, and support your journey to optimal musculoskeletal health.

Experience excellence in fracture management with San Marcos Orthopedics. Your recovery is our priority.
